author: Anderson .Paak to open Bruno Mars’ 24K Magic World Tour - Dreammy Blog
title: Comment on Bruno Mars’ 24K Magic World Tour spans 105 dates and hits 17 different countries by Anderson .Paak to open Bruno Mars’ 24K Magic World Tour - Dreammy Blog
text:
Reddit 
Whoever books Bruno Mars ’ tour deserves a serious raise. Not once in my entire history at CoS have I seen an artist schedule shows at all four NYC-area arenas — MSG, Barclays, Prudential, and Nassau — within days of one another. Not only that, but the R&B crooner will also visit lesser traveled cities like Fargo, North Dakota; Lincoln, Nebraska; and Little Rock, Arkansas. 
And all that’s just scratching the surface of the 90-date, 17-country tour just announced in support of Mars’ forthcoming album, 24K Magic . 
Update – November 23rd: Mars has added 15 additional shows to the docket, including dates in the UK (London, Birmingham, Manchester), Europe (Amsterdam, Paris), and North America (San Jose, Vancouver, Edmonton, Montreal, New York, Boston). 
Scroll though the extensive itinerary below, and look for 24K Magic when it hits stores on November 18th. 
Bruno Mars 2016-2017 Tour Dates: 12/02 – Las Angeles, CA @ Staples Center (iHeartRadio Jingle Ball) 12/27 – National Harbor, MD @ The Theater at MGM Grand National Harbor 12/30 – Las Vegas, NV @ Park Theater at Monte Carlo Resort and Casino 12/31 – Las Vegas, NV @ Park Theater at Monte Carlo Resort and Casino 03/11 – Las Vegas, NV @ Park Theater at Monte Carlo Resort and Casino 03/12 – Las Vegas,
